text: Pedro Agulto Tenorio (born August 8, 1941), who is often known as Pete A. Tenorio, was the Resident Representative to the United States from the U.S. Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands (CNMI). He is a member of the Republican Party. He was the second Lieutenant Governor of the Northern Mariana Islands from 1982 to 1990. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Lieutenant Governors of the Northern Mariana Islands Category:Living people Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:University of Hawaiʻi at Mānoa alumni
title: Pedro Agulto Tenorio
